name: Abduction
description:
As Travis Connor, Head of Research and Development at at Sin-Tech, you must infiltrate a space station in order to uncover a sinister plot. The R&D organization, EGB-5 has been working to get advanced knowledge from aliens. Recently it has come to light that the aliens are building an army of cyborg clones to use against Earth.

Abduction is a point-and-click adventure that uses a top-down perspective. Explore the space station, discov objects and utilize them to solve the mystery. The mouse-driven interface lets you easily use various objects to interact with the environment.

shot.caption: You start onboard the space station you must infiltrate.
Investigating the environment can reveal useful items.
Collect items to be used to solve puzzles later.
You need some sort of lever to open the locker.
Opening a locker to get a gun and card.
The lab contains inert cyborg clones.
The clones are programmed to eliminate earthlings!
The cryogenics room is lit in red light.
